name: This Portfolio
details: Built with React and Typescript with a responsive design
Generates PDF copy of resume using puppeteer to screenshot a template page built in React

name: Top Gamer
details: Leaderboard for free-for-all or team games
Currently used for Monopoly Deal games among coworkers

name: Mario Kart Optimizer
description: Tool for finding optimal stat configurations
details: Determines configuration that maximizes the sum of the selected stats
Allows individual components (i.e. character) to be locked while others are optimized for
